## Working with cohorts

```{r, eval = FALSE, include = FALSE}
# preparation, no need to replicate
cdm <- mockAdherenceFromOMOP()

cohort <- dplyr::tibble(
  cohort_definition_id = 1, person_id = 1,
  cohort_start_date = as.Date("1980-01-01"),
  cohort_end_date = as.Date("2020-01-10")
)

DBI::dbWriteTable(conn = connection, name = DBI::Id(schema = "main", table = "cohort"), value = cohort, append = TRUE)
  
```

Possible to include only certain people that exist in a specific previously defined cohort between a time period. For this add cohort schema and cohort id values

```{r, eval = FALSE}
chronicDrugExposureCohort <- generateChronicDrugExposure(
  cdm = cdm,
  name =  "test_table",
  overwrite = T,
  cohortSchema = "main",
  cohortId = 1,
)
```
